# Peshawar Panthers

The Peshawar Panthers was a domestic T20 and List A cricket team based in Peshawar, Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, Pakistan. The team was established in 2004 and its home ground was Arbab Niaz Stadium.
Winners
Peshawar Panthers won Haier T20 Cup 2014-15, beating Lahore Lions on the back of an unbeaten half century (50*) by Iftikhar Ahmed. Scoreboard: [http://www.espncricinfo.com/haeir-cup-t20-2014-15/engine/match/781089.html Cricinfo]
